MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH14 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Juniper Green and surrounding streets. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:15 AM on Monday, 15 February 2021.
